FuncDef:
The track route-monitor-group command enables a CGN service-location backup group to monitor a routing group.
The track route-monitor-group command disables a CGN service-location backup group from monitoring a routing group.
By default, no routing group is configured in a CGN service-location backup group.

ParaDef.Info:
Sets a weight value.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 32000.

Specifies the name of a routing group.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
In CU separation mode, when N:1 warm backup coexists with distributed CGN, to enable a service-location backup group to monitor the routing group status, run the track route-monitor-group command.
Prerequisites
The CU warm backup mode has been enabled in the service-location view.
